SamPy.fitting.fits.linearregression¶

SamPy.fitting.fits.linearregression(x, y, confidence_level=95, show_plots=False, report=False)¶

A function to calculate simple linear regression inputs: x,y-data pairs and a confidence level (in percent) outputs: slope = b1, intercept = b0 its confidence intervals and R (+squared)
